definition: representative work (of an author or artist)
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: Saturday was the representative work of periodicals of civil literature in early Minguo.
sentences.chinese: 《礼拜六》是民国初年市民文学期刊的代表作。

sentences.english: "Wang Zhaojun" is one of Caoyu's famous dramas in his late years.
sentences.chinese: 《王昭君》是曹禺先生晚年戏剧创作的代表作之一。

sentences.english: "Lo River Map" is one of his classic masterpiece.
sentences.chinese: 《洛神赋图》即为他的经典代表作之一。

sentences.english: "Waiting for Godot" has been regarded as a masterpiece of "Theatre of the Absurd".
sentences.chinese: 《等待戈多》一直被认为是荒诞派戏剧的代表作品。

sentences.english: East Palace, West Palace (Dong gong xi gong) is commonly referred to as the first of Sixth Generation Chinese movies.
sentences.chinese: 《东宫西宫》通常被认为是中国第六代电影的代表作。

sentences.english: And what are his major works in each period?
sentences.chinese: 各个时期的代表作品是什么？

sentences.english: Longju Temple, established during the Sui Dynasty (581-618), is a representative of the historic relics on the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 隋代修建的龙居古刹是这座名山的代表作。

sentences.english: Mei Cheng's Qifa is one of the representatives of the Hanfu.
sentences.chinese: 枚乘的《七发》是汉赋代表作之一。

sentences.english: His magnum opuses include The Starry Night, Sunflowers etc.
sentences.chinese: 他的代表作有《星夜》，《向日葵》等。

sentences.english: Thirty Imitated Poems is no doubt the most representative one of Jiang Yans works.
sentences.chinese: 《杂体诗三十首》无疑是江淹诗歌的代表作。

sentences.english: And Camel Xiangzi is one of the representatives.
sentences.chinese: 《骆驼祥子》便是老舍的代表作之一。

sentences.english: The Longju Temple established during the Sui Dynasty (581-618) is the representative of the historic relics on the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 隋代修建的龙居古刹是这座名山的代表作。

sentences.english: Sour soup fish is one of the representative dishes of Guizhou.
sentences.chinese: 酸汤鱼是贵州“黔系”菜肴的代表作之一。

sentences.english: Voss is the masterpiece of the famous Australian writer, Patrick White.
sentences.chinese: 《探险家沃斯》是澳大利亚著名作家怀特的代表作。

sentences.english: Running in the Night is one of the representative works of Wang Xiao-bo.
sentences.chinese: 《红拂夜奔》是王小波的代表作品之一。

sentences.english: Aimdst Three Gorges is Ahvu' s early representative works.
sentences.chinese: 《山峡中》是艾芜早期小说的代表作。

definition: representative individual (of a school of thought)
to put effort into (work, farming, writing etc)/a masterpiece
to create/to produce/to write/creative work/creation/CL:個|个[ge4]
